doc:
Harold Russell https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harold_Russell 0 Harold John Avery Russell (January 14, 1914 – January 29, 2002) was a Canadian-born American World War II veteran who became one of only two non-professional actors to win an Academy Award for acting (the other being Haing S. Ngor). Russell also has the distinction of being the only performer to sell his Oscar award at auction. Harold_John_Avery_Russell ( January_14_,_1914 – January_29_,_2002 ) was a_Canadian-born_American_World_War_II_veteran who became one of only_two_non-professional_actors to_win an_Academy_Award for acting ( the_other being Haing_S._Ngor ) . Russell also has the_distinction of being the_only_performer to_sell his_Oscar_award at auction .
